class.name: BinomialDistribution

javadoc.text: Create a binomial distribution with the given number of trials and * probability of success.
Access the number of trials for this distribution.
Access the probability of success for this distribution.
{@inheritDoc}For {@code n} trials and probability parameter {@code p}, the mean is{@code n * p}.
{@inheritDoc}For {@code n} trials and probability parameter {@code p}, the variance is{@code n * p * (1 - p)}.
{@inheritDoc}The lower bound of the support is always 0 except for the probability * parameter {@code p = 1}.
javadoc.return: lower bound of the support (0 or the number of trials)

javadoc.text: {@inheritDoc}The upper bound of the support is the number of trials except for the * probability parameter {@code p = 0}.
javadoc.return: upper bound of the support (number of trials or 0)

javadoc.text: {@inheritDoc}The support of this distribution is connected.
